item.title: US Stocks Picked
item.description: RIVN (Rivian Automotive, Inc.) Middle Rivian faces challenges in the current EV market, but strategic partnerships and new product releases may provide opportunities for growth. SLB (Schlumberger Limited) Middle Given positive sentiment from Wall Street analysts and potential opportunities in the energy sector, Schlumberger (SLB) presents a favorable investment opportunity with some associated risks.
